sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"预言，预示，预告"之意。
means: forecast ： 指对未来事件的预报、推测或设想，侧重最终可能出现的结果。
foretell ： 一般的通俗用语，往往指根据客观因素做出的预告，强调预先要发生的事。
predict ： 较正常的正式用词，通常用于人。指根据事实或自然规律进行推断后作出预告，隐含有科学的准确性。
foresee ： 指提前、预先料到将要发生的事或指对未发生的事情形成一种概念或判断。

sentence.Network_en: Willow trees breaking out into buds foretell the coming of spring.
Astronomers can accurately foretell the date, time, and length of future eclipses.
sentence.Network_cn: 天文学家能精确地预告未来日食月食的日期 、 时刻和时长.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 预字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 预压〖 preforming〗 预言〖 prophesy;predict;foretell〗 预演〖 previewofaperformance〗.
foregoing 在前的,前面的foretell 预测,预示,预言forge 锻造
自己总结不定词--过去式--过去分词 - 豆丁网 ... foreseen 预见；预知 foretell 预言；预示；预告 foretold 预言.
预字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 预备役〖 reserveduty〗 预卜〖 augur;foretell〗 预测〖 forecast;calculate〗.

list.abs: It is believed that tellers can foretell your fate ., 人们相信算命人可以预测你的命运.
they foretell only slight price increases ; less than 4 % on the consumer index .他们预言，价格只会微调；消费指数低于4个百分点。
a person who foretells your personal future ., 预言你个人未来的人.
this person can foretell things with miraculous accuracy , without the slightest error ,此人料事如神，毫发不爽。

entry.def: If you foretell a future event, you predict that it will happen.

example.ex: ...prophets who have foretold the end of the world.
example.tran: 预言了世界末日的先知

means.word_mean: 2. make a prediction about; tell in advance;

auth_sentence.content: It is impossible to foretell the future with any degree of accuracy.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is impossible to foretell the future with any degree of accuracy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is impossible to foretell the future with any degree of accuracy.

auth_sentence.content: Together we may be able to foretell this year's final twelve.
auth_sentence.res_content: Together we may be able to foretell this year's final twelve.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Together we may be able to foretell this year's final twelve.

auth_sentence.content: In fact, two numbers all but foretell the outcome of the crystal-forming simulations.
auth_sentence.res_content: In fact, two numbers all but foretell the outcome of the crystal-forming simulations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In fact, two numbers all but foretell the outcome of the crystal-forming simulations.

sentences.en: She foretold that the man would die soon.
